answers.answer: Its not the weight of the baby its head size and shoulder circumference. If baby head circumference is 13-13.5 then chances are high you are good tell them no you can do that. I would demand amnio though if they insist. Gd babies lungs developed later.
If baby is small you may have some sort of placental insufficiency they may want to take baby early because of the risk of lack of oxygen/ nutrients
